Introduction

Bitsaeon is a South Korean singer under FM Entertainment. He is the main vocalist of the boy group M.O.N.T and a member of the upcoming boy group B.D.U.

He is best known for being a contestant on the reality survival show MIXNINE and Build Up : Vocal Boy Group Survivor.

Bitsaeon was part of the winning team on Build Up. He will be part of B.D.U a project group that will promote for 2 years. The debut date is June 26, 2024.
